name: zustand-sync
author: Mayank Kumar Chaudhari <https://mayank-chaudhari.vercel.app>
description: Zustand middleware to easily sync Zustand state between tabs and windows

scripts.publish-package: cp README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.pp2: node seo.js && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.pp3: node seo1.js && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.pp4: node seo2.js && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.p-gpr: node createPackageJSON.js && cp README.md dist && node prepGPR.js && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
